The Porkbun provider is used to interact with the Porkbun service.

If you find this provider useful, please consider supporting me through GitHub Sponsorship or Ko-Fi to help with its development.

string.description: The base URL for the Porkbun API. Defaults to `https://api.porkbun.com/api/json`. It can be sourced from the `PORKBUN_BASE_URL` environment variable.
The API key for the Porkbun account. It can be sourced from the `PORKBUN_API_KEY` environment variable.
The secret API key for the Porkbun account. It can be sourced from the `PORKBUN_SECRET_KEY` environment variable.
